title: test_push_subds_no_recursion fails with unreleased git

labels.name: fix-implemented
labels.description: A fix is available, but has not been merged or released, yet.

body:
Running the `push` tests while working on something else, I hit the following failure:

```
======================================================================
FAIL: datalad.core.distributed.tests.test_push.test_push_subds_no_recursion
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/kyle/src/python/venvs/datalad/lib/python3.7/site-packages/nose/case.py", line 198, in runTest
    self.test(*self.arg)
  File "/home/kyle/src/python/datalad/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 714, in newfunc
    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
  File "/home/kyle/src/python/datalad/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 714, in newfunc
    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
  File "/home/kyle/src/python/datalad/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 714, in newfunc
    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
  [Previous line repeated 1 more time]
  File "/home/kyle/src/python/datalad/datalad/core/distributed/tests/test_push.py", line 385, in test_push_subds_no_recursion
    assert_status('ok', res)
  File "/home/kyle/src/python/datalad/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 1268, in assert_status
    dumps(results, indent=1, default=lambda x: str(x))))
AssertionError: Test 1/1: expected status ['ok'] not found in:
[
 {
  "action": "publish",
  "refds": "/tmp/datalad_temp_test_push_subds_no_recursiona0kf3kwr",
  "status": "notneeded",
  "message": "Given constraints did not match any changes to publish",
  "type": "dataset",
  "path": "/tmp/datalad_temp_test_push_subds_no_recursiona0kf3kwr"
 }
]
```

That's with git version 2.27.0.437.gb3809f4674 on DataLad's 0.13.0-19-g33f25c76b.  The test passes with v2.27.0.  

I'll take a closer look later.
